circumstances:
While returning to UK following a bombing mission over Berlin, the four engine aircraft crashed in unknown circumstances in a field located in Gerbis, near Jessen. All seven crew members were killed. 
Crew /640th Squadron):
P/O W. C. McLeod, 
Sgt A. P. Webb, 
Sgt N. L. Cooper, 
Sgt S. W. Wheeler, 
Sgt J. C. Burdett, 
Sgt R. H. Turner,
Sgt J. N. Boston.
